translation.en: [Geoffrey] Good morning, Lusaka!
This is Reporter Geoffrey bringing you the Lusaka News!
While the sun may be shining brightly, last night
translation.ko: 지금은 햇살이 눈 부시지만 정체불명의 토네이도가 어젯밤 또 한 번 불었는데요

translation.en: another mysterious tornado struck.
translation.ko: 정체불명의 토네이도가 어젯밤 또 한 번 불었는데요

translation.en: Its powerful winds knocked out power for hours.
translation.ko: 강력한 바람 때문에 몇 시간 동안 정전이 되었죠

translation.en: -Iye, Geoffrey, I know. -[man] Hey, iwe!
Elo, I was busy finishing my project for the Science fair ka.
translation.ko: 전 과학 박람회에 낼 과제 끝내기에 한창이었어요

translation.en: Geoffrey, do you realize Mr. Magedzee -is going to be there? -[grunts]
translation.ko: 조프리, 마겟지 씨가 거기 갈 거라는 거 알죠?

translation.en: These tricky twisters were previously unheard of in Zambia, and indeed, Africa.
translation.ko: 이 이상한 토네이도는 잠비아, 심지어 아프리카에서도 듣도 보도 못했습니다

translation.en: So why are they happening, Geoffrey?
Blackouts from load shedding were bad enough. Now tornados?
translation.ko: 절전을 위한 정전도 모자라 토네이도까지 온다고요?

translation.en: [groans] Likando, why did I join the majorettes?
It's bad enough being the new kid at school.
Ah-ah, Monde.
Did you forget you were captain of your old majorette team?
translation.ko: 네가 예전 학교에서 응원단장이었던 거 잊었어?

translation.en: You've got this, little sis.
These tornados are just another disaster battering Lusaka.
translation.ko: 루사카를 강타한 재난은 이 토네이도만이 아닙니다

translation.en: With an increase in crime and daily blackouts,
the people are calling for Mayor Sikazwe's resignation.
translation.ko: 시민들은 시카즈웨 시장의 사임을 촉구하고 있습니다

translation.en: -[chanting] No more blackouts! -Please! No more load shedding!
translation.ko: - 정전은 그만! 절전은 그만! - 제발 진정하세요

translation.en: Sisi, if Mayor Sikazwe gets fired, you could lose your job.
translation.ko: 언니, 시장님이 해고되면 언니도 잘리는 거 아니야?

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
I don't plan on being the mayor's assistant for long.
translation.ko: 시장 비서로 오래 일할 생각 없어

translation.en: I see much bigger and better things for us soon.
translation.ko: 훨씬 더 크고 좋은 일이 조만간 생길 거야

translation.en: Iwe Monde! Get over here now!
[sighs] Coming, Marjory.
This is Chipo
with Kamiji Secondary's very own star player of the fútbol team,
translation.ko: 카미지 중학교 축구 팀의 스타플레이어인 지코모 피리를 소개합니다!

translation.en: Zikomo Phiri!
This is Zee with Kamiji Secondary School's very own Chipo Hamoonga,
translation.ko: 저는 지예요 카미지 중학교의 치포 하뭉가를 소개합니다

translation.en: who is crushing on Komana Mwiinga.
Stop, ekse! -[Zee laughing]
[Temwe] One vitumbuwa. Two vitumbuwa.
Who am I kidding?
Thank you, Ba Saasa!
-[Mr. Nkwashi] Hey! -Huh? Temwe Chiti! Are you stealing food?
translation.ko: 템웨 치티! 방금 음식 훔친 거야?

translation.en: Principal Nkwashi, what do you take me for?
translation.ko: 응콰시 교장 선생님 절 어떻게 보시고 이러세요?

translation.en: -A delinquent? -Hm.
I've got my eye on you, Chiti.
What's the other eye doing?
[Geoffrey] Lusaka hasn't endured this kind of turmoil in 20 years.
Who can keep our city safe?
Mama K's Juice Ya Cheapa!
-T.O.M.I., come online please. -T.O.M.I. here, Mama K.
The threat is growing, T.O.M.I.
We need our new team today to keep our people safe!
translation.ko: 주민들을 지키려면 하루빨리 새 팀을 꾸려야 해

translation.en: Commencing final footage collection to confirm our candidates.
translation.ko: 후보를 확정하기 위한 마지막 영상 수집을 시작합니다

translation.en: -Mama K! -[hiccups] Oh!
-Are you all set up? -Oh, yes, Mr. Nkwashi, thank you.
translation.ko: 마마케이! 준비 다 되셨어요? 네, 응콰시 선생님! 고마워요

translation.en: Um, if you don't mind, I may need to speak to you later
translation.ko: 내 과일 채소 가판대를 도와줄 봉사자들에 관해서

translation.en: about volunteers for my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.ko: 내 과일 채소 가판대를 도와줄 봉사자들에 관해서 나중에 의논하면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Volunteers? Anything to help a member of our little community.
translation.ko: 봉사자요? 우리 주민을 돕는 일이라면 뭐든 해야죠

translation.en: -[slurping] -[Mr. Magedzee] Hello, everybody! Hello, bantu banga.
I am Lee Magedzee, owner of Magedzee Power Corporation.
translation.ko: 전 마겟지 전력의 사장인 리 마겟지입니다

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me to Kamiji Secondary School's Science Fair.
translation.ko: 카미지 중학교 과학 박람회에 초대해 주셔서 감사합니다

translation.en: At MPC, we are committed to bringing power to the people!
translation.ko: 저희 엠피씨는 주민들을 위해 전력 공급에 힘을 다합니다

translation.en: I am beyond excited to see your inventions
and discover if one of you
will be the next recipient of our MPC scholarship!
The power to save our world starts with you students.
translation.ko: 세상을 구하는 힘은 학생 여러분들이 시작하는 겁니다

translation.en: Yes!
Mr. Magedzee!
[clears throat] I am Komana Mwiinga.
I would like to apply for the MPC Scholarship.
So nice to meet you.
May I present to you my Carbon Capture machine.
Very intriguing. I'm all ears.
Well, the concept is based on--
Another power station attack.
And the tornado is headed here.
T.O.M.I., focus on the tornado.
translation.ko: 토미, 토네이도에 집중해 무슨 일인지 알아야 해

translation.en: -We need to know what is really going on. -[T.O.M.I.] Yes, Mama K.
translation.ko: 토미, 토네이도에 집중해 무슨 일인지 알아야 해 네, 마마케이

translation.en: Attention! Take shelter under the stands! Follow me!
translation.ko: 여러분! 스탠드 아래로 피하세요! 절 따라오세요!

translation.en: [Ba Saasa] Help! Somebody! I'm trapped.
translation.ko: 살려 줘요! 누가 좀 도와줘! 끼였어!

translation.en: -[gasps] -Help!
Hey! -Help Mr. Nkwashi. -Huh?
Help me, please!
But Ba Saasa! And the vitumbuwa!
Help!
-Help! -I've got them!
translation.ko: 도와줘! 나한테 맡겨! 이거 좀 쓸게요, 할머니

translation.en: [grunting] May I use this, Gogo?
translation.ko: 나한테 맡겨! 이거 좀 쓸게요, 할머니

translation.en: Ba Saasa, use this!
Help!
-Mr. Nkwashi, pull yourself to safety. -Don't tell me what to do, Chiti!
translation.ko: 응콰시 선생님, 이걸 잡고 안전한 곳으로 가세요! 나한테 명령하지 마!

translation.en: But I'm trying to help you! [screams]
Hm. I should have saved the vitumbuwa.
Help! Help!
Help!
-Let's go, Marjory. -Eh! Let's go who?
Let's go, Captain.
-[yells] -I've got you, Chipo!
-Run! -[Chipo yelps]
Gogo, run!
[Geoffrey] A freak tornado ran through the city, striking another power station
translation.ko: 전례 없는 토네이도가 또 발전소를 덮쳤고

translation.en: and wreaking havoc on Kamiji Secondary School.
-Tensions in Lusaka are rising… -[coughing]
…with endemic blackouts bringing life to a standstill, and repeated…
Komana. [coughing]
Here you go, Ta. Use this.
-Catch your breath. -[inhales]
-Are you okay now? -Yes. Thank you.
Mr. Nkwashi just called. You are required to attend a meeting.
translation.ko: 응콰시 선생님이 전화 왔어 네가 회의에 와야 한다는구나

translation.en: Are you in trouble?
Huh? What? No. Wait. When is this meeting?
Mr. Magedzee is giving me another chance to present my Carbon Capture machine.
translation.ko: 마겟지 씨가 제 탄소 포집기를 다시 보자고 했거든요

translation.en: At his office in just a few hours!
-Mr. Nkwashi said, "Right now." -[exclaims] And gave me an address.
translation.ko: 응콰시 선생님은 당장 오라셔 주소도 주셨어

translation.en: It's not at school. Where is this?
So I guess I'm not the only one with detention.
translation.ko: 나머지 공부는 나만 하는 게 아니었네?

translation.en: Yeah, you have the wrong girl.
translation.ko: 아니, 사람 잘못 봤어 내가? 나머지 공부를?

translation.en: Me? Detention? Aweh. We don't mix.
translation.ko: 아니, 사람 잘못 봤어 내가? 나머지 공부를? 난 그런 거 안 해

translation.en: Me neither. I just moved here.
translation.ko: 나도 그래 이사 온 지도 얼마 안 됐어

translation.en: Oh. Hi. I'm Monde.
[Zee] Hey. Zee.
If we're not serving detention, why did Mr. Nkwashi send us here?
translation.ko: 나머지 공부가 아니라면 응콰시 선생님이 왜 부르신 거지?

translation.en: Because I asked him to.
Oh! The Juice Ya Cheapa lady.
Muli bwanji, girls.
[girls] Bwino bwanji, Gogo.
I am Mama K. This is Chomps.
-[bleats] -[Mama K] And you have arrived at my fruit and vegetable stand.
You four have been offered
this great opportunity to give back to your community.
translation.ko: 우리 지역에 보답할 좋은 기회가 너희에게 생겼어

translation.en: -Opportunity for free labor, ka. -[giggles]
You will save the world working here.
translation.ko: 너희는 여기서 일하면서 세상을 구하게 될 거야

translation.en: Eh? Here?
Mm, Gogo. I have an important appointment this afternoon.
translation.ko: 할머니, 전 오늘 오후에 중요한 약속이 있어요

translation.en: From what time to what time are we saving the world?
translation.ko: 몇 시부터 몇 시까지 세상을 구하는 거죠?

translation.en: Right now. But not right here.
translation.ko: 지금 당장 할 거야 하지만 여기서 하진 않아

translation.en: Come with me.
What's that story with the old lady luring kids with sweets?
translation.ko: 할머니가 과자로 애들을 꼬드기는 이야기가 뭐였지?

translation.en: She's like a little old gogo, ha. Totally harmless.
translation.ko: 그냥 작은 할머니잖아 아무 일 없을 거야

translation.en: -Little old gogo? -Hmm. That's how people disappear.
translation.ko: 그냥 작은 할머니? 사람들이 그러다가 실종되는 거야

translation.en: [Mama K] Follow me, please.
Mama weh. We are going to disappear. [yelps]
As you know, girls,
mysterious tornados have been causing destruction across Lusaka.
translation.ko: 정체불명의 토네이도 때문에 루사카가 파괴되고 있어

translation.en: But there is more to it than meets the eye.
translation.ko: 하지만 눈에 보이는 게 다가 아니란다

translation.en: Abeg. You're one of those conspiracy theorists with an underground bunker.
translation.ko: 지하 벙커에서 일하는 음모론자 같은 분이세요?

translation.en: This is where you are going to save the world.
What?
-[Temwe] Are you serious? -[Komana] Ati, what?
So cool.
-What? -[bleats]
Wait, does Mr. Nkwashi know about this?
No. He just thinks you're volunteering at the stand above.
translation.ko: 아니, 위에 있는 가판대에서 봉사하는 줄 알지

translation.en: This is my little secret.
[Komana] What is this place?
Many years ago,
I was part of a secret government agency, working in these very headquarters,
translation.ko: 비밀 정부 기관 소속으로 바로 이 본부에서 일하면서

translation.en: fighting evil forces in our city.
Sha! This gogo is lekker.
Eh, eh, eh. Did you just say evil forces? Evil how?
As I was saying,
translation.ko: 아까 말했듯이 눈에 보이는 게 다가 아니란다

translation.en: things are not what they seem. T.O.M.I., pull up drone footage from yesterday.
translation.ko: 아까 말했듯이 눈에 보이는 게 다가 아니란다 토미, 어제 찍은 드론 영상 틀어 줘

translation.en: Artificial intelligence.
Artificial boyfriend. [chuckles]
Ah. Technological Operations Management Interface. T.O.M.I.
translation.ko: 기술 운영 관리 인터페이스 즉, 토미라고 해

translation.en: T.O.M.I., zoom in, please.
[T.O.M.I.] Zooming in.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is that a guy caught in the tornado?
translation.ko: 토네이도 안에 어떤 남자가 갇힌 거예요?

translation.en: He's not caught in it. [beeping] -[Komana] Basa, he's controlling it.
translation.ko: 갇힌 게 아니야 저 사람이 몰고 있어!

translation.en: [Mama K] Yes! The tornados are not a freak act of Mother Nature.
translation.ko: 그래! 이 토네이도는 이상한 자연 현상이 아니야

translation.en: They are an act of a supervillain.
Supervillain?
Wait, wait, wait! How? Why?
I'm not sure yet. We need to find out and put a stop to him.
translation.ko: 그건 나도 아직 몰라 우리가 이자를 찾아서 막아야 해

translation.en: We? Did you just say "we"? She just said "we."
translation.ko: 우리요? 우리라고 하셨어요? 방금 우리라고 하셨어

translation.en: Mm. That's what she said. We.
I have been observing you keenly for weeks. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 내가 몇 주 동안 너희를 자세히 지켜봤단다

translation.en: [Temwe] Observing us? You mean like, stalking?
It's called gathering intelligence.
And based on what I've gathered,
it is clear that you are the elite super squad I need to help save Lusaka.
translation.ko: 너희는 루사카를 구할 엘리트 무리가 틀림없어

translation.en: You mean, superheroes!
Uh, yeah. Okay. Superheroes.
And based on my astute observations,
I have built super suits distinctive to each of you.
translation.ko: 너희 각자에게 딱 맞는 슈퍼슈트를 제작했단다

translation.en: -[gasps] -What? This is so…
[Mama K] They've been designed to boost each of your natural abilities.
translation.ko: 너희 각자의 타고난 능력을 개선해 주도록 설계됐어

translation.en: They'll keep you safe and protect your identity.
translation.ko: 너희를 안전하게 지켜 주고 신분도 보호해 줄 거야

translation.en: All this talk about a suit. So what's with the watch?
translation.ko: 슈트 말씀을 하시면서 왜 시계를 주세요?

translation.en: Can I get a "whoa"?
translation.ko: 감탄 좀 해 주면 안 돼?

translation.en: [girls] Whoa.
Oh! Sorry, Chomps!
[laughing] Oh, it happens.
Now, girls, it is extremely important
that you keep your secret identities secret.
No one can know.
-Not your sister. -[gasps] [Mama K] Not your father. Not your bestie friend.
translation.ko: 네 언니도, 네 아버지도 네 가장 친한 친구도 안 돼

translation.en: Not your vitumbuwa vendor.
translation.ko: 너와 친한 비툼부와 상인도 안 된다

translation.en: You know about Ba Saasa?
It is for their protection as much as yours.
translation.ko: 너희뿐 아니라 그 사람들을 보호하기 위해서야

translation.en: [girls] Yeah. Okay.
It has been 20 years since Lusaka needed a team of heroes.
If we want our people to survive, they need a team they can depend on.
translation.ko: 주민들이 살아남으려면 의지할 만한 팀이 필요해

translation.en: But why us, Mama K?
[chuckles] It's not every day
a 60-year-old lady sees four young women running into danger, shwi!
translation.ko: 위험으로 휙 돌진하는 여자애 네 명이 할머니 눈에 띄는 건

translation.en: Without thinking of themselves.
But being a hero takes more than super strength suits
translation.ko: 하지만 초강력 슈트와 최첨단 장비가 있다고 전부 히어로가 되는 건 아니다

translation.en: and high-tech gear.
It takes character. Together,
translation.ko: 개성이 필요해 너희 모두 이 팀에 필요한 타고난 자질을 지녔어

translation.en: you possess the innate qualities this team requires.
translation.ko: 너희 모두 이 팀에 필요한 타고난 자질을 지녔어

translation.en: Komana, K-Bongo, the lover of knowledge.
Zee, Za-Mpezi, fast like lightning.
Monde, M-Kozo, the bringer of peace.
And Temwe, T-Mlilo, full of fire.
Aww! I wanted to be T-Licious.
But T-Mlilo is awesome. Fiyah!
The mind, body, soul, and heart of our team.
translation.ko: 우리 팀의 마음과 몸과 영혼과 심장

translation.en: Together, you are my Team 4.
-Okay! -So, is Team 4 ready to save Lusaka?
translation.ko: - 좋아요! - 자 팀 4, 루사카를 구할 준비가 됐니?

translation.en: -Ya, ya, ya! -Yes, Mama K.
-Yes. Mm. -Yeah!
T-Mlilo in the byu byu!
Eh, byu byu? As in, building?
Eya boom! You got it, Mama K. Za-Mpezi in the byu byu.
translation.ko: 네! 맞아요, 마마케이 자-음페지 멋지게 등장!

translation.en: Me too! M-Kozo in the byu byu!
My appointment! I'm going to be late.
K-Bongo, wait!
-Are you in… -The byu byu?
-No. -[girls] What?
I need to get that scholarship from Mr. Magedzee.
translation.ko: 전 마겟지 씨의 장학금을 받아야 해요

translation.en: Mama K, I'm sorry.
Wait, ba jobee,
you are leaving all these nice, nice things for the ka scholarship?
translation.ko: 얼마 안 되는 장학금 때문에 이 멋진 걸 포기한다고?

translation.en: My entire future depends on it.
And my dad.
[sniffles] He's sick.
This is not how I'm going to save the world.
translation.ko: 제가 세상을 구하는 방식은 이게 아니에요

translation.en: I can't… I can't do it all.
-But-- -Ah, ah. Let her go.
The water may be boiling on the stove,
but no one can force you to pour in the mealie meal.
translation.ko: 물을 떠먹여 줄 수는 없는 거야

translation.en: You have to be hungry.
So, T-Mlilo's Team 3! -[bleats] -How does everyone feel about that?
translation.ko: 그러면 티-믈릴로의 팀 3! 다들 이건 어때?

translation.en: [Mama K] Ah! What is happening, T.O.M.I.?
-[girls] Oh ,no! -Girls, it's Go Go time!
[Komana] Thank you for letting me present my project to you.
translation.ko: 제 과제를 소개할 기회를 주셔서 감사해요

translation.en: [Mr. Magedzee] Of course, Komana.
We can't let a tornado get in the way of science, can we?
translation.ko: 토네이도 때문에 과학을 중단하면 안 되지

translation.en: No, sir.
This is my solar-powered Carbon Capture machine.
translation.ko: 이건 제가 만든 태양열 탄소 포집기예요

translation.en: My machine doesn't just capture carbon.
translation.ko: 제 기계는 탄소만 잡는 게 아니에요

translation.en: It uses electricity generated from solar panels
to split CO2 into energized carbon monoxide and oxygen.
Once carbon monoxide is released, it's combined with hydrogen
to produce safe, synthetic carbon-based fuels.
translation.ko: 안전한 합성 탄소 연료를 생산해 내요

translation.en: Uh-huh. So we can purify dangerous CO2 from the atmosphere
while producing clean fuel and oxygen at the other end.
It's brilliant. How did you choose solar as your power source?
translation.ko: 정말 기발한데? 왜 태양열을 동력으로 선택했지?

translation.en: Well, I looked into a number of energy resources.
Geothermal, wind,
even an extremely rare mineral called Zambianite.
translation.ko: 심지어 잠비아나이트라는 희귀한 광물도 조사해 봤죠

translation.en: Ah, yes, I've heard of that mineral.
translation.ko: 그래, 그 광물은 나도 들어 봤어

translation.en: But ultimately, in Lusaka, the sun was the most reliable.
Very true. And why a portable version of the Carbon Capture machine?
translation.ko: 그렇지, 탄소 포집기를 왜 휴대용으로 만들었지?

translation.en: My dad developed breathing problems from the pollution,
translation.ko: 아빠가 오염 때문에 호흡에 문제가 생겼어요

translation.en: and other people might be suffering the same way.
translation.ko: 다른 분들도 이런 병을 앓을 것 같았고요

translation.en: That's what I love!
Technology made to benefit the lives of others.
translation.ko: 다른 사람의 삶을 이롭게 하는 기술이야

translation.en: Astounding, Komana! I am impressed!
While we have a few candidates left to interview,
translation.ko: 면접을 볼 후보가 좀 더 남았지만

translation.en: I can tell you that you are in the top running.
-[people screaming] -We'll have the final results soon.
translation.ko: 네 순위가 높다는 건 확실해 곧 최종 결과를 알려줄게

translation.en: [gasps] Dad!
Um, Mr. Magedzee, I have to go. Thank you, sir.
Thank you for…
coming, Komana.
Ta? Ninzi?
-Komana. -Ta? Are you okay?
I'm here, I'm here.
[Komana] Help! Help!
-Did you hear that? -Look, over there!
Imwe, tiyeni!
-[grunting] -Komana! I need help!
Whati?
Huh. Well. That's new.
Ta!
Komana… You know these girls?
Get him in the van. I'll take him to hospital.
translation.ko: 아버지를 차에 태워 내가 병원에 데려다줄게

translation.en: Komana. Thank you, daughter.
-Ta. -[coughing]
-You saved my dad's life. -[Mama K] Don't worry, Komana.
translation.ko: 아빠의 목숨을 구해 주시다니 걱정하지 마, 코마나 아빠 괜찮으실 거야

translation.en: He's going to be fine.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 코마나 아빠 괜찮으실 거야

translation.en: Mama K, I can save the world in different ways.
translation.ko: 마마케이, 다양한 방법으로 세상을 구할 수 있다는 걸

translation.en: I see that now.
-Is it too late to… -[chuckles]
Suit up!
Yah!
Bantu banga, we need to get to whoever is inside controlling this!
translation.ko: 얘들아, 이걸 모는 자가 누구든 어서 처리해야 해

translation.en: T-Mlilo! Let's use your ribbon, like you did with Mr. Nkwashi.
translation.ko: 티-믈릴로! 네가 응콰시 선생님을 구했을 때처럼 리본을 쓰자

translation.en: Great idea. [grunts]
Are you hurt?
Just my pride. And my butt.
translation.ko: 내 자존심과 엉덩이만 조금 긁혔을 뿐이야

translation.en: We got him!
What do we do?
What is that?
It's a brazier!
Look at you, K-Bongo!
Breaking up that tornado's cold air with a firebomb.
translation.ko: 토네이도의 차가운 공기를 불 폭탄으로 부수다니

translation.en: Genius, ekse. Genius.
All this trouble has been caused by some old man.
translation.ko: 이 모든 문제가 웬 노인 때문이었다니

translation.en: Old?! Old?!
I am Storm Drain.
Creator of chaos!
-King of climate! -[beeping]
[chuckles] I will not be defeated!
Looks like you just were, Grandpa.
I can't believe we pulled that off.
[Mama K] Job well done!
Congratulations, Team 4!
[Geoffrey] The public was pleasantly surprised
when a group of heroes calling themselves Team 4
translation.ko: 자칭 팀 4라는 히어로 무리가 나타나자 군중이 놀랐는데요

translation.en: finally put an end to the natural disaster that was not so natural after all.
translation.ko: 별로 자연스럽지 않았던 자연재해를 완전히 막았습니다

translation.en: So, who are these heroes, and where do they come from?
translation.ko: 이 히어로들은 누구이며 어디에서 나타난 걸까요?

translation.en: Perhaps our pleas for help
have finally been answered.
Be careful, Lusaka.
Those pleas will soon be drowned out by my power.
translation.ko: 그 소원은 곧 내 파워에 묻힐 테니까
